Executes the command and its relevant tasks before returning a String output to indicate status of command
* @return A string indicating status of execution.
* Represents the command to close the chatbot
* Handles the execution of a bye command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the bye command.
* Represents a command to add a deadline task to the chatbot task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a deadline command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the deadline command.
// Take the substring of user input after deadline
// Divide the substring into task name and deadline
output += String.format("you now have %d tasks\n", tasks.size());
output = "date must be in the format yyyy-mm-dd\n";
output = "deadline description must contain a date!\n";
* Represents a command to delete a task from the chatbots task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a delete command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the delete command.
output += String.format("you now have %d tasks\n", tasks.size());
output = "the index you have entered does not exist!\n";
output = "delete description must be an integer!\n";
* Represents a command to add an event task to the chatbot task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a event command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the event command.
// Take the substring of user input after event
// Divide the substring into task name and date
output += String.format("you now have %d tasks\n", tasks.size());
output = "date must be in the format yyyy-mm-dd\n";
output = "event description must contain a date!\n";
* Represents a command to find a task in the task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a find command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the find command.
* Represents the command to get help in the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a help command.
* @return A String message displaying list of commands available.
+ "   list (list out all tasks in your todo list)\n"
+ "   todo <task> (add a basic task to your todo list)\n"
+ "   deadline <task> /by <yyyy-mm-dd> (add a task with a deadline to your todo list)\n"
+ "   event <task> /at <yyyy-mm-dd> (add a new event with its corresponding date to your todo list)\n"
+ "   mark <task index> (mark that specific task as completed)\n"
+ "   unmark <task index> (remove mark from specific task)\n"
+ "   delete <task index> (remove task from todo list)\n"
* Represents the command to list all tasks in the chatbots task list.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a list command.
* @return A String message listing all the tasks in the task list.
* Represents a command to mark a task as done in the chatbots task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a mark command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the mark command.
output = String.format("great job! I've marked this task as done: %s\n", t.getName());
output = "the index you have entered does not exist!\n";
output = "mark description must be an integer!\n";
* Represents a command to add a todo task to the chatbot task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of a todo command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the todo command.
// Take the substring of user input after todo
output += String.format("you now have %d tasks\n", tasks.size());
output = ("the description of a todo cannot be empty!\n");
* Represents any invalid command passed to the chatbot by the user.
* Handles the execution of an invalid command.
* @return A String message telling the user that the command is invalid.
return "invalid command! try 'help' for list of commands\n";
* Represents a command to unmark a task in the chatbots task list.
* @param commandDescription The whole user input String.
* @param tasks The task list associated with this instance of the chatbot.
* Handles the execution of an unmark command.
* @return A String message regarding the execution status of the unmark command.
output = String.format("Boo! more work to do: %s\n", t.getName());
output = "the index you have entered does not exist!\n";
output = "unmark description must be an integer!\n";

* Initialise the Parser that will be used to parse all user inputs.
+ "   list (list out all tasks in your todo list)\n"
+ "   todo <task> (add a basic task to your todo list)\n"
+ "   deadline <task> /by <yyyy-mm-dd> (add a task with a deadline to your todo list)\n"
+ "   event <task> /at <yyyy-mm-dd> (add a new event with its corresponding date to your todo list)\n"
+ "   mark <task index> (mark that specific task as completed)\n"
+ "   unmark <task index> (remove mark from specific task)\n"
+ "   delete <task index> (remove task from todo list)\n"
assertEquals("unmark description cannot be empty!\n", parser.parse("unmark"));
assertEquals("unmark description must be an integer!\n", parser.parse("unmark 1.2"));
assertEquals("the index you have entered does not exist!\n", parser.parse("unmark 5"));
assertEquals("Boo! more work to do: Buy Groceries\n", parser.parse("unmark 1"));
assertEquals("mark description cannot be empty!\n", parser.parse("mark"));
assertEquals("mark description must be an integer!\n", parser.parse("mark one"));
assertEquals("the index you have entered does not exist!\n", parser.parse("mark 4"));
assertEquals("great job! I've marked this task as done: Buy Groceries\n"
assertEquals("the description of a todo cannot be empty!\n", parser.parse("todo "));

assertEquals("task added:
" + "[T][ ] study
" + "you now have 4 tasks
"
assertEquals("deadline description cannot be empty!\n", parser.parse("deadline "));
assertEquals("deadline description must contain a date!\n", parser.parse("deadline do "));
assertEquals("event description cannot be empty!\n", parser.parse("event "));
assertEquals("event description must contain a date!\n", parser.parse("event one"));
+ "you now have 4 tasks\n", parser.parse("event virtual meeting /at 2022-04-04"));
assertEquals("delete description cannot be empty!\n", parser.parse("delete "));
assertEquals("delete description must be an integer!\n", parser.parse("delete one"));
assertEquals("the index you have entered does not exist!\n", parser.parse("delete 4"));
assertEquals("invalid command! try 'help' for list of commands\n", parser.parse("help1"));
